name: It Whispers Justifications
description:
A puzzle game full of ruined fates and broken souls.

This is an early-morning-alpha-pre-beta build. So only endless mode without saving progress is available.

Controls:

  • [Esc] - pause menu.
  • [R] - quick restart.
  • [Mousewheel] - zoom in, zoom out.
  • [Left Mouse Button] - touch nefls.
  • [Right Mouse Button] - move camera.
